======Number of aliens for vindicator pellets to pierce.======

= Description =

Number of aliens for vindicator pellets to pierce. Set to 0 to disable.

This cvar will only have an effect if the damage for the vindicator pellets is high enough to kill an alien and still have some damage left AND <!--[asw_vindicator_pierce_chance]-->[[asw_vindicator_piercing_chance.wiki|asw_vindicator_piercing_chance]] is a reasonable value.
